title: French expat promotes traditional Chinese medicine
description: A Frenchman has realized his dream in China by becoming an inheritor of centuries-old traditional Chinese medicine (TCM). Philippe Emmanuel Couste said it is his lifelong pursuit to promote TCM and help treat patients.
